title: DAYCHANGE / TEQUILA BED
description: The dialogue between You and your bed. You can sleep, not sleep, read your ledger.

dialogueTree.title: Bed: "The bed is comforting, if a bit run..."
dialogueTree.english: The bed is comforting, if a bit run down. Still, you've earned a rest.
dialogueTree.polish: Łóżko koi nerwy, choć jest trochę zniszczone. Zasłużyłeś na odpoczynek.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Ложак супакойвае нервы, хаця трохі пашкоджаны. Ты заслужыў адпачынак.

links.title: Bed: "The sheets feel at once coarse and..."
links.english: The sheets feel at once coarse and clammy against your skin. The bed sags beneath your weight as you stretch out and finally close your eyes...
links.polish: Pościel wydaje się jednocześnie szorstka i lepka. Łóżko ugina się pod twoim ciężarem, kiedy wyciągasz się i w końcu zamykasz oczy...
links.belarusian: Пастель адначасова здаецца шурпатай і ліпкай. Ложак прагінаецца пад тваёй вагой, калі ты выцягваешся і, нарэшце, закрываеш вочы...

links.title: Bed: "The sheets feel at once coarse and..."
links.english: The sheets feel at once coarse and clammy against your skin. The bed sags beneath your weight as you stretch out and finally close your eyes...
links.polish: Pościel wydaje się jednocześnie szorstka i lepka. Łóżko ugina się pod twoim ciężarem, kiedy wyciągasz się i w końcu zamykasz oczy...
links.belarusian: Постэль здаецца адначасова шурпатай і ліпучай. Ложак прагнецца пад вашай вагой, калі вы расцягваецеся і нарэшце зачыняеце вочы...

links.title: Bed: "Across the room, the heating system..."
links.english: Across the room, the heating system hums its soft lullaby. The mattress feels soft and sheets warm. It only takes you moments for the world to fall away...
links.polish: Ogrzewanie po drugiej stronie pokoju mruczy, jakby śpiewało kołysankę. Materac jest miękki, a pościel ciepła. Po ledwie kilku chwilach świat wokół ciebie znika...
links.belarusian: Ацяпленне на другім баку пакоя гудзіць, быццам спявае калыханку. Матрац мяккі, а пасцельная бялізна цёплая. Праз некалькі імгненняў свет вакол цябе знікае...

links.title: Bed: "The window is fixed, the sheets are..."
links.english: The window is fixed, the sheets are new, it's easier to fall asleep than ever before...
links.polish: Okno zostało naprawione, pościel jest świeża. Łatwiej tu zasnąć niż kiedykolwiek wcześniej...
links.belarusian: Акно было адрамантавана, пасцельная бялізна свежая. Заснуць тут прасцей, чым калі-небудзь раней...

links.title: Bed: "The passage of time has not made th..."
links.english: The passage of time has not made the sheets any less coarse. The bed sags beneath your weight as you close your eyes and drift off into an uneasy sleep...
links.polish: Upływ czasu nie sprawił, że pościel stała się jakkolwiek mniej szorstka. Łóżko ugina się pod twoim ciężarem, kiedy zamykasz oczy i zapadasz w niespokojny sen...
links.belarusian: Плынь часу не зрабіла пасцель менш шурпатай. Ложак прагінаецца пад тваёй цяжарам, калі ты закрываеш вочы і апускаешся ў неспакойны сон...

links.title: You: "No time to rest yet. [Leave.]"
links.polish: To jeszcze nie czas na odpoczynek. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: Гэта яшчэ не час для адпачынку. [Адыдзі].

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "The option to go to sleep becomes a..."
links.english: The option to go to sleep becomes available every night after 21.00.
links.polish: Opcja pójścia spać staje się dostępna każdego wieczora po 21:00.
links.belarusian: Варыянт пайсці спаць становіцца даступным кожны вечар пасля 21:00.

dialogueTree.title: Bed: "The bed's a little nicer now. You c..."
dialogueTree.english: The bed's a little nicer now. You could get a good night's sleep here.
dialogueTree.polish: Łóżko jest teraz nieco przyjemniejsze. Mógłbyś się tu nieźle wyspać.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Ложак цяпер крыху прыемнейшы. Ты мог бы тут добра выспацца.

dialogueTree.title: Bed: "The bed is still cold from the brok..."
dialogueTree.english: The bed is still cold from the broken window, and not too inviting. But it's yours. You've earned it.
dialogueTree.polish: Łóżko wciąż jest zimne przez tę rozbitą szybę i nie wygląda zbyt zapraszająco. Ale jest twoje. Zapracowałeś na nie.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Ложак усё яшчэ халодны праз гэтую разбітую шыбу і не выглядае занадта запрашальна. Але ён твой. Ты яго заслужыў.

dialogueTree.title: Bed: "The bed is cold and not particularl..."
dialogueTree.english: The bed is cold and not particularly inviting, but it's yours. The sheets look awful...
dialogueTree.polish: Łóżko jest zimne i nie wygląda szczególnie zapraszająco, ale za to jest twoje. Pościel wygląda okropnie...
dialogueTree.belarusian: Ложак халодны і не выглядае асабліва прывабна, але затое ён твой. Пасцельная бялізна выглядае жудасна...
